title: Blocked Shots with Alex Berenson and Russ Vought
itunes:title: Blocked Shots with Alex Berenson and Russ Vought
description:
Parents have overwhelmingly rejected Covid vaccines for their young children. Foreign countries are moving away from mass vaccination of the young. But in America, Biden's CDC is pushing for Covid shots to go on the child vaccine schedule. Alex Berenson joins Charlie to discuss how opposing mandates could be a GOP path to victory in blue states. Plus, Russ Vought joins to discuss the intel agencies' decades-long history of hurting ordinary Americans.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
